#include<stdio.h>
#include<math.h>
#define INF 1000000009
#define min(a,b) ((a)<(b))?(a):(b)
#define max(a,b) ((a)>(b))?(a):(b)
struct bit
{
    int one,zero;
};

struct bit fun(int a)
{
  struct bit e;
  e.zero=0;
  e.one=0;
  while(a>1)
  {
      if(a&1)
        e.one++;
      else
        e.zero++;
      a>>=1;
  }
  return e;
}

int main()
{
    int t,n,s,i,x,y,res;
    struct bit e;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%d",&n);
        e=fun(n);
        res=INF;
        if(!e.one)
            printf("%d\n",e.zero-1);
        else
        {
            s=e.one+e.zero;
            for(i=1;i<=s;i++)
            {
                x=n&(int)(pow(2,i)-1);
                y=n-x;
                e=fun(x);
                x=e.zero+2*e.one;
                e=fun(y);
                y=e.zero+2*e.one;
                res=min(res,max(x,y));
            }
            printf("%d\n",res);
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
